author: Adrian Collins
description:
Kill Lupercal is exactly what I signed up for when paying for Warhammer TV. Big, bold, visually mesmerising, sad, and stacked with grit in the face of hopelessness, Kill Lupercal showcases how good the 40k genre is on screen. 10,000 years prior to the current world of Warhammer 40k, the betrayer of humanity, Horus Lupercal […]

The post REVIEW: Kill Lupercal appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Kill Lupercal
